articles.title: Amar Singh Chamkila’s killers demanded the keys to his car; driver recalls witnessing the murder, not being able to sleep for 15 days - The Indian Express
articles.description: Amar Singh Chamkila and his wife, Amarjot Kaur, were killed by masked gunmen in the town of Mehsampur in 1988. Their driver, Ranjeet Singh, recalled the events of their last day in an old interview, published in 2017.
